#### About 

This web application uses a joint frailty-logistic predictive model based on the 3 clinical trials to predict individualized rate and severity of exacerbations. 

Please refer to the manuscript for more details on the structure of the model and the validation process.

#### User Manual

For more information about the model and how to access it, please refer to the [ACCEPT user manual](https://resplab.github.io/acceptManual/section-introduction.html).
